column4: I have installed Samba, but when I browse the directory structure and attempt to add shares should it not be giving me an option to use Samba? maybe im lost...I will do more reading...but if anyone has any input please feel free..linux newbie so please take it easy ;)
i am just clicking on Places - Choosing Computer then right clicking on a file and choosing Share
